titleStmt.title: J. R. Boyle to Beriah Magoffin
CWG1366

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Military Correspondence, 1859-1862

body.p:
(Telegraph Office)
Louisville Ky May 30 1861
Gov. Beriah Magoffin
Dr Sir
Herewith please find copies of messages Sent and received by you during your stay here also copy of one sent from Frankfort -- to Tooms -- Montgomery --
Will you please acknowledge for me to Mr Monroe Secy of State the receipt of his letter -- & hand him enclosed, bill for accompanying despatches

Resptfy Yours
J, R, Boyle
Agt
